<h3>Raccoon Miner</h3>

With Raccoon Miner you can easily mine crypto with your PC and earn bitcoins.<br>
You only require a bitcoin address or a <a href="https://www.nicehash.com/">NiceHash</a> account.<br>

<br>
<br>

Features:<br>
• Automatic suspend mode when in game<br>
• Configurable CPUs and GPUs<br>
• Overview of Hash Rate and NiceHash balance<br>

<br>
Raccoon Miner is in development. Please use the feedback form to send us feature requests and bug reports.
